name: airo-prototype
description: A fully responsive prototype of the GoDaddy Airo interface based on Figma designs.

scripts.figma:tokens: echo 'Install figma-tokens plugin and export tokens.json here'
scripts.figma:icons: echo 'Export SVG icons from Figma to assets/icons/'
scripts.figma:images: echo 'Export images from Figma to assets/images/'
scripts.build:tokens: echo 'Convert Figma tokens to CSS custom properties'
